title: About
text: Thoughts about science, statistics, and risk from someone who is trying to understand them.

title: Post With Code
text:
This is a post with executable code.


Code
sims = np.random.normal(size=10_000)

px.histogram(
    x=sims,
    histnorm="probability density",
    height=350
)

title: What is this blog for?
text:
I’m making this blog to better organize my thoughts and developing my writing skills, mostly through technical/programming/science communication. It will probably contain coding tutorials, weird opinion pieces, and maybe the occasional book review.
I don’t know if what I think is of interest to anybody, so I am beginning this project with the humble goal of writing things that I would enjoy reading.
